function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reduced Chinese imports leading to global economic downturn","Impact":"Decreased global trade by over 4%","Mitigation":"Diversify trade partners and strengthen local economies","Technologies":"Trade analytics and forecasting tools","People":"Global trade stakeholders","Owner":"Governments and trade organizations"},{"Description":"Restrictions in mobility and aviation activities","Impact":"Immense loss in aeronautical revenues and flight cancellations","Mitigation":"Implement strict travel restrictions and safety measures","Technologies":"Aviation management and tracking systems","People":"Aviation industry stakeholders","Owner":"Government aviation authorities and airline companies"},{"Description":"Limited avenues to reduce costs for airports during traffic declines","Impact":"Financial strain and operational challenges for airports","Mitigation":"Explore cost-saving measures and seek financial assistance","Technologies":"Airport management and optimization software","People":"Airport management and operators","Owner":"Airport management and local government authorities"}]}
